parameter.name: perPage
parameter.description: The number of entries per page.

parameter.name: page
parameter.description: The page number of the returned page.

parameter.name: sortField
parameter.description: The case field on which you would like to sort.

parameter.name: sortDirection
parameter.description: The direction to sort - asc for ascending, desc for descending.

parameter.name: inSupportCenter
parameter.description: If provided and set to true, the returned topics will be limited to those which are included in support center.

parameter.name: articleSearchText
parameter.description: Count only articles that match this text string.

parameter.name: acceptLanguage
parameter.description: ISO language code. Return only topics for this language code and return the translated fields for the name and description.
